titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2360) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-242, by Mr. Sessions.
All points of order against the conference report to accompany H.R. 2360 and against its consideration are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 99.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 474.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/6/2005--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2360) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006.
